description:
This story is the reason people believe cats have nine lives.

A family moved from Washington to Colorado and was beside themselves after figuring their cat got spooked and ran away while loading the moving truck. So while they searched high and low, they had no choice but to head to their new destination without their feline companion.

After three long weeks, the family presumed the worst, which is that they will never see their cat, Sunny-Loo, again. However, after three weeks their cat was found alive when the movers dropped off their sofa.
title: Military family reunited with their missing kitty after the movers  discovered where the cat had been hiding for three weeks

description:
Why does it seem that whenever someone is accused of committing a heinous act they always seem to come out as a “proponent for the LGBTQ community” sooner or later?

Casey Anthony, who is arguably "America's most hated mom," has launched a new video series to “operate appropriately as a legal advocate" for her daughter, whom she was previously accused of killing. She claimed her “goal is to continue to help give a voice to people;" this includes her being “a proponent for the LGBTQ community, for our legal community, and women's rights.”

NEW: Casey Anthony, who was accused of m*rdering her daughter, has come out as an LGBTQ and women’s rights advocate, says she is “standing in the light.”

Anthony claims it’s her duty to defend people who are being attacke
title: Casey Anthony (yes, that one)  launches new video series as self-proclaimed “LGBTQ proponent"

description:
According to Zelenskyy, the end of the war is not in the foreseeable future. So this means by his admission, he has no plan for “peace as long as he has America’s backing.”

🚨 TRUMP FIRES BACK AT ZELENSKY

"Zelensky supposedly [said] he thinks the war will go on for a long time... he better not be right about that. That's all I'm saying..." pic.twitter.com/JyOWItZJ5J
— Eric Daugherty (@EricLDaugh) March 3, 2025
title: Trump fires back at Zelenskyy's latest war claims: "He better not be right about that..."

description:
At a certain point, it becomes impossible to determine if some leftists are painfully naive or pathological liars. So while it’s unclear if AOC is the former or the latter, both may be true for her.

During Trump’s first term, he created one of the most secure borders in American history. However, one of the first things Sleepy Joe did in office was slash all those policies while creating the worst border
title: AOC blames GOP for America's open borders, but that's not as silly as what she said about the Laken Riley Act

description:
Rep. Jasmine Crockett would do herself a lot of favors if she kept her mouth shut but she has proved she intends to do the exact opposite, despite being factually incorrect most of the time. So while we have seen more of her the past several weeks than all of her political career combined, it’s evident she is just getting started.

Crockett said on MSNBC that Trump “is an enemy to the United States,” while claiming he is “occupying” the White House as if the popular vote did not elect him.

The unquestioned leader of the Democratic Party. Keep going! https://t.co/XYAFeoEVQL
— Scott Jennings (@ScottJenningsKY) March 3, 2025
title: Jasmine Crockett, the unquestioned leader of the Democrats, has a hissy fit calling Trump an enemy of the state

description:
President Trump and Vice President Vance had a contentious discussion with Zelenskyy on Friday regarding the future of the war with Russia, highlighting the problem of finding willing conscripts in Ukraine. Today’s show breaks it down.

- YouTube
title: Watch: After Zelesnskyy blowup, will Trump ditch NATO and let Ukraine crumble?

description:
The left and the media (but I repeat myself) are apocalyptic that Elon Musk has been appointed by Donald Trump to shrink the size of government, expose waste, and dismantle the bureaucracy that keeps the left in power even when they aren't in power. "He's unelected," cries journalismers as they light their Anthony Fauci prayer candles. And, like any time the media and the left (but I repeat myself) have a political disagreement, they accuse you of racism. Today that means the New York Times' pathetic attempt to die Cousin Elon to South African apartheid.

Mind you, this is the same NYT that's ok with apartheid when it targets white people. Or, if not "okay" with it, they are quick to make excuses.
title: NYT drops despicable anti-Elon Musk hit piece tying him to apartheid... but didn't they try this one already?

description:
You need to have health insurance. Even though you may not need to have health insurance. Medical procedures and check-ups can sometimes be cheaper without health insurance. But if you have health insurance, they can be more expensive for you than if you didn't have health insurance. And if you have health insurance, you can't choose not to use your health insurance. Make sense? Of course not. And neither does this father's story.

His daughter needed a life-saving ambulance ride, which cost $600. Then he got a bill for $1300. Either his insurance company charged $2300, or the ambulance charged $2300. Either way, insurance only covered $1000. And now the dad has to pay $1300, even though he could have paid $600.
title: Father goes viral after daughter's lifesaving ambulance ride cost him four times more for HAVING health insurance

description:
Volodymyr Zelenskyy visited with President Trump and Vice President Vance at the White House on Friday afternoon for a contentious discussion regarding the future of the war with Russia, highlighting the problem of finding willing conscripts on Ukrainian soil, many on the right have called for the United States to leave NATO, English is now the official language of the United States of America, Saturday Night Live continues to suck, and more!

TRUMP MAKES ENGLISH OFFICIAL
title: Sources: Should Trump Ditch Free-riding NATO After Zelensky Blowup? (Sources)
